Headline: #18 16th/18th Temporary Reroute at Halsted/18th
ShortDescription: 18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Halsted, Cermak, Damen, 188th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 18th, Halsted, Cermak, Damen, 188th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #39 Pershing Reroute at California/Pershing
ShortDescription: #39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via near California/Pershing.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 39th, California, Archer, Kedzie, 39th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near California/Pershing.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #55 Garfield Reroute at 55th/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted near 55th/Sacramento.
